page.title: 18A CHILD IN CHOPWELL WOODS
page.content: My name is Jill. I have a brother called Ian. Four years ago we moved into Chopwell Woods. I live in a small hamlet with fourteen people living in six houses. My brother and I are the only children, apart from two who are sixteen and eighteen. Our house has 19 rooms. It was built in 1907. There are bats in our loft. My Dad once found a soldier's button there. We have a 1 acre garden with over 30 trees. Chopwell Woods is 800 acres. Two years ago a fire burned down a lot of trees. It took 17 fire engines to put the fire out. In the winter I sometimes see deer and rabbits, and squirrels in spring. I sometimes hear an owl. I have 20 pets - 4 ducks, 13 doves, 2 dogs and a rabbit.
